OCaml Labs

These are software packages developed and maintained at OCaml Labs, either directly by us or with our industrial collaborators at Citrix, Jane Street, OCamlPro, and of course with a huge amount of help from the wider OCaml community.

liquidsoap

  • version 1.0.1
  • 1.0.1-full
  • 1.1.0
Maintainer contact@ocamlpro.com
Dependencies ocamlfind & pcre-ocaml & camomile & dtools & duppy = 0.4.2 & mm = 0.2.0 & ocaml-mad
Optional dependencies cry | ao | portaudio | alsa | pulseaudio | bjack | taglib | lame | aacplus | ogg | vorbis | theora | opus | faad | flac | ladspa | samplerate | gavl | ffmpeg | frei0r | dssi | xmlplaylist | lastfm | lo
Last update Jun 3, 2013
Source http://downloads.sourceforge.net/project/savonet/liquidsoap/1.0.1/liquidsoap-1.0.1.tar.bz2
c3a05596056d1c3f256e9c2e00f4ff27
Statistics Not installed in the last month.

Swiss-army knife for multimedia streaming

Liquidsoap is a powerful and flexible language for describing your streams. It offers a rich collection of operators that you can combine at will, giving you more power than you need for creating or transforming streams. But liquidsoap is still very light and easy to use, in the Unix tradition of simple strong components working together.

Dependencies

mm ( = 0.2.0 )
